channel.title: Special attacks, And all special attack IDs

item.title: Special attacks, And all special attack IDs
item.dc:creator: @dimebagx dimebagx
item.description:
@dimebagx wrote:

246 = red portal glow - zammy - Drag Baxe Special
248 = Dragon Longsword SPECIAL
250 = Magic Longbow SPECIAL
251 = Dragon Mace SPECIAL
252 = Dragon Dagger SPECIAL
253 = Dragon Spear SPECIAL
256 = Magic Shortbow SPECIAL
282 = Dragon Halberd SPECIAL - in front
283 = Dragon Halberd SPECIAL - behind you
284 = Dragon Halberd SPECIAL - to your left
285 = Dragon Halberd SPECIAL - to your right
306 = Dragon Dagger SPECIAL - in PURPLE 
341 = Abyssal Whip SPECIAL
347 = Dragon Scimitar SPECIAL
398 = Guthan Special
399 = Torags Special
400 = Ahrims Special
401 = Karils Special

Well first up, I was wonder how to test those like, Can I type a command that does them??

Secondly In the server I have, The special bar shows up and works perfectly for the whip,
But it only shows up for the whipâ€¦

I was wondering how/where to add this to other weps with specials.

Heres what I dug out.

case 48023: if(!specOn) { sendQuest("@yel@S P E C I A L A T T A C K", 12335); specOn = true; } else { sendQuest("S P E C I A L A T T A C K", 12335); specOn = false; } break;

And

public int specBar = 10; public int specialRestoreTimer; public boolean specOn = false; public void SpecialsProcess() { esbar(12323); getRefill(); getFilling(); } public void esbar(int id) { outStream.createFrame(171); outStream.writeByte(0); outStream.writeWord(id); flushOutStream(); } public void resetBar() { specOn = false; sendQuest("S P E C I A L A T T A C K", 12335); }

And the attack function, with the whip ID in it.

public boolean Attack() { if(specOn) { if(specBar > 2) { client targ = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit * 2); stillgfx(341, targ.absY, targ.absX); PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true; specBar -= 3; resetBar(); } else { sendMessage("You need more special energy to do that"); resetBar(); }

Pls help, I want this for other weps as well as whips.

Read full topic
